short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspired by the Ship It Button extension. On Github page adds a button for a random Emoji icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by the Ship It Button extension, this extension for GitHub. It provides a button for a random Emoji icon to comments.
Added all possible emoji.
